ygData.subject: Re: Stupidity and class boundries (was RE: Why do so many clerics think they're wizards?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... classes make ... The only time I ve had to use my DD in a group is in Unrest. Playing with yard trash. Everyone just wanted to sit down and rest after
ygData.messageBody:
>who play their character a different one than was intended. The cleric or
>enchanter that casts DD are the best examples because both of these
classes make
>a group perform much better with less risks when we do OTHER things.

The only time I''ve had to use my DD in a group is in Unrest. Playing with
yard trash. Everyone just wanted to sit down and rest after surviving a
train of Werebats, so I just pumped the rest of my mana into word of
shadow, and let the fighters take out all the beetles and TD's with one
hit. Then we lay back for a long snooze
